item.title: For you people who do not know how to make commands!
item.dc:creator: @goo458 goo458
item.description:
@goo458 wrote:

difficulty:1/10

base:can be used on any server (but i used pimpscape)

Assumed Knowledge: how to type

Classes Modified:client.java
please do not get all mad at me! i know this might have been done many times before!

ok well this is my first tut hope you like!!

first you need to find: customCommand

what is there might look like this [code]public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.trim();
[/code]

now that you have found that here is how to add the code!

after the word: command.trim();

put a space

now here is how to add a item command (a command to add a item)

if (command.startsWith("name of command")) { addItem(item id, amount);

the name of the command is what you well type to activate the command!

like so:say the command name was cat…i would put this in the chat box on moparscape ::cat

then it would give me what i put in the item id space!

ok now back to the code!

now say i wanted it to send a message when i have done this command. i put this code with the code i have

sendMessage("message here.");

now it should look like this

if (command.startsWith("name of command")) { addItem(item id, amount); sendMessage("message here.");

now this message thing well work with all commands!

now i well show you how to add player rights thing! (this well make it so anyone can use it,or jest mods,or jest owners)

add this to your code

&& playerRights >= player rights here)

now your code should look like this.

if (command.startsWith("name of command")) && playerRights >= player rights here) addItem(item id, amount); sendMessage("message here.");

0= anyone can use it.

1= only mods can use it

2= only owners can use it

now i well show you how to make add skill xp commands! (make your skills go up.)

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“command name here”) && playerRights >= player rights)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“message when done.”);
}

[/code]

you can change the skill thing!

now you can take off the right and message.

and that is basicly it!

right here i well put stuff for people who are kind of good at commands!!!

teleaport command:

add this to teleaport

you can also put the player rights and the message thing on here if you want!

opps i need to learn this (coming soon)

well thanks for reading this!

please post!!! i well never remove unless a mod or a owner of this site tells me to remove this!

Read full topic
